why.title: Why use My Anime Collection?
why.point1: It's 100% free and contains no ads.
why.point2: It's easy to use and intuitive.
why.point3: We take security very seriously and use advanced encyrption to protect your information from breaches, and hacking attempts.
why.point4: My Anime Collection does not use cookies to track you for advertising purposes and does not request personal data from any third parties.
why.point5: We're always working on adding new features and improvements.
why.point6: AI-powered anime suggestions help you discover your next favorite show.
